inclusion.criterion: Standardised workup to exclude alternative diagnoses
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: All patients must agree to use methods of medically acceptable forms of contraception
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: agreed to use methods of contraception

exclusion.criterion: Weekly average worst pain score >= 30 on a 0 to 100 point scale
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other known organic GI diseases (e.g. Inflammatory bowel disease - Crohns disease, Ulcerative colitis.)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to stop anti-diarrhoeal drugs for the duration of the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and Clostridium difficile toxin positive stool samples. She has abdominal pain, diarrhea, and fever.
